content: step-by-step pictures are taken the paws ears and tail are sewn to the teddy cat for this pattern it is essential that you use chunky yarn the cat will not turn out at all the same if you use regular worsted weight yarn but bulky and chunky yarns will be purr-fect the yarn i used for this cat does not make good triangles which is why the ears are more rounded rounded ears make them look like teddy cats so i think it s cute the body is worked with yarn bee chunky cozy occasion butterscotch medallion the paws are worked with yarn bee white yarn bee fleece lite yarn please leave a project of your kitty and a picture when you ve finished i would love to see it enjoy
